Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and aligns closely with the perceived value you see in the product. Don't miss out on this chance to secure a high-quality item at an advantageous rate. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
